hackathon-description-text: Kerala's first Media Hackathon, proudly presented by ManoramaOnline in connection with Techspectations, the first ever digital media summit in Kerala.
hackathon-eligibility: Entry restricted to the shortlisted candidates from the applications received at

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A Cash prize to the 1st place team in the amount of INR 2,00,000 -  to be split evenly among all team members.
A Cash prize to the 2nd place team in the amount of INR 1,50,000 - to be split evenly among all team members.
A Cash prize to the 3rd place team in the amount of INR 1,00,000 - to be split evenly among all team members.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How we can use this product - generic to media industry
Sustainability of the product over years - is this a short life or long term product
Can we built on this product to accommodate future business requisites / needs
Business potential of the ideal - scope of revenue & projected expenses
Efficiency of coding & whether it follows the standards
The  technology used to built the solution / product & its future feasibility.

hackathon-description-header: Bringing together the most forward thinking innovators, product visionaries, designers, mobility experts and programmers to one big Techspectation!
